include ("${THIRD_PARTY_LIB_LOCATION}/CMake-Register_External_Lib.txt")

set (LIBFUSE_ARCHIVE "${LIBFUSE_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/lib/.libs/libfuse.a")

# this is the same target as in libfuse4x... DO NOT INCLUDE THEM BOTH AT THE SAME TIME!!
register_external_lib (libfuse ${LIBFUSE_BUILTIN_LOCATION} ${LIBFUSE_ARCHIVE})

set (CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -I${LIBFUSE_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/include -D_BUILT_IN_LIBFUSE")
set (CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -I${LIBFUSE_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/include -D_BUILT_IN_LIBFUSE")
